name: Spaghetti & Meatballs Game
blurb: The Spaghetti & Meatballs Game, is pure fun for you to challenge and play with your friends on Facebook!

rewards.reward: No Reward
BACKER EXCLUSIVE Spaghetti & Meatballs Digital Wallpaper\r\nFacebook Page Shout-out as a backer of the project!\r\nExclusive Spaghetti and Meatballs mp3
200 Parmesan Cheeses (the game\u2019s hard currency, a $20 value!!). This will be enough to purchase some items and power-ups. And the rewards above.
300 Parmesan Cheeses (the game\u2019s hard currency, a $30 value!!). This will be enough to purchase some items and power-ups. And the $5 rewards.

500 Parmesan Cheeses (the game\u2019s hard currency, a $50 value!!). This will be enough to purchase many items and power-ups. and the $5 rewards. BACKER RIBBON forever emblazoned next to your profile pick when playing the game (All contributions above this level will also get this reward).

700 Parmesan Cheeses (the game\u2019s hard currency, a $70 value!!). This will be enough to purchase many items, power-ups and unlock more content. and the $5 rewards. Early access to the game and to the forums, be part of the creative process and help make Spaghetti and Meatballs the most fun experience possible.

800 Parmesan Cheeses (the game\u2019s hard currency, a $80 value!!). This will be enough to purchase most items, power-ups and unlock some levels. and the $5 rewards. Early access to the game and to the forums, be part of the creative process and help make Spaghetti and Meatballs the most fun experience possible.
In honor of the SF Giants sweeping the world series, this rewards offers a SF Giants Hat and Broom for you to customize your meatball with. Lets go Giants!!! Plus the $50 rewards.

1000 Parmesan Cheeses (the game\u2019s hard currency, a $100 value!!). This will be enough to purchase most items, power-ups and unlock more content. and the $5 rewards. Early access to the game and to the forums, be part of the creative process and help make Spaghetti and Meatballs the most fun experience possible. And your name in the credits as Tester.
EXCLUSIVE BACKER meatball customization item. This will only be available for Kickstarter backers. And the $50 rewards.
EXCLUSIVE! Gold and Platinum colors for your meatball. For the Backer who enjoys flashing ;) And the  $50 to $65 rewards.
INTERNATIONALIZATION, tell us what language you\u2019d like the game to be in and we\u2019ll make sure it\u2019s available. And the $50 to $100 rewards.
EXCLUSIVE Spaghetti and Meatballs T-Shirt. (All contributions above this level will also get this reward)

Your likeness included in the game as a meatball (you\u2019ll have it right away others need to unlock it ;). Your name will also be listed as a contributor in the game's credits. Plus the $50 to $150 rewards.
Be an extra in the Spaghetti & Meatballs live action commercial. Where you'll get to meet the staff and play a "real" version of the game. Plus the $50 to $150 rewards.

A custom, signed and framed, print of your meatball. You choose how to customize your meatball and we'll make a unique digital painting, one of a kind, completely original. Includes a signature and a certificate indicating that you were one of the lucky few who received one of these for your contribution to this project. This level also includes the $50 to $150 rewards.

The Executive Producer Package! For those who really love games and indie game development, everything we are offering, one of each item: A custom playable game meatball in your likeness, a signed piece of custom artwork, a t-shirt. Your Name as an Executive Producer in the credits, and a perpetual account that will always get the latest powerups and content packs automagically unlocked! If you want it all, this is the only way to go. This level also includes the $50 to $150 rewards.

GAME INDUSTRY SPECIAL! We are selling 4 spots for these but the price will go up with each one committed. Be early for the lowest price slots!  We will cross promote your Facebook/iOS/Android game in an in game banner. All of the $1000 rewards.

GAME INDUSTRY SPECIAL! We are selling 4 spots for these but the price will go up with each one committed. Be early for the lowest price slots!  We will cross promote your Facebook/iOS/Android game in an in game banner. All of the $1000 rewards.

GAME INDUSTRY SPECIAL! We are selling 4 spots for these but the price will go up with each one committed. Be early for the lowest price slots!  We will cross promote your Facebook/iOS/Android game in an in game banner. All of the $1000 rewards.

GAME INDUSTRY SPECIAL! We are selling 4 spots for these but the price will go up with each one committed. Be early for the lowest price slots!  We will cross promote your Facebook/iOS/Android game in an in game banner. All of the $1000 rewards.

Corporate Sponsorship! Get the Whole Lasagna! You get everything listed above, plus an amazing launch party at one of the best venues in San Francisco, California. We arrange a special mixer event between you and a few other lucky Backers where you get to \u201cmeat\u201d the development team and the amazing artists. Have your company logo at the party and in the game. Attendees, will also include game industry influencers, journalists, and other developers. Your contribution covers accommodations and airfare to and from San Francisco, from anywhere in the US. This level also includes all of the $1000 and up rewards. (For International backers please add $1,000)
